title: Kurumpadame (version 2) Lyrics Vil Ambu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kurumpadame uyirgiraai
Thirai veliye kuthikiraai
Aruginiley varugiraai
Mayakangalai tharugiraai

Oli thiralaal izhukiraai
Vizhigalai nee parikiraai
Mayakugiraai ulagathai
Iyakugiraai en idhayathai

Penne Penne
Nee vandha pinne
Konjam thadam maarinen
Anbe Anbe
Nee vandha pinbae
Kaadhal unarndhen

Kurumpadame uyirgiraai
Thirai veliye kuthikiraai
Aruginiley varugiraai
Mayakangalai tharugiraai

Innum innum azhagenna boomiyai
Undhal kangal maatrudhey
Oh kuviyathin mayyamadhu nee yena
Indha kaadhal maatrudhey
Endhan nera mullil
Pookal pookirathey
Undhal kannil endhan
Kaadhal paarkindren
Moodaathey!

Kurumpadame uyirgiraai
Thirai veliye kuthikiraai
Aruginiley varugiraai
Mayakangalai tharugiraai

Penne Penne
Nee vandha pinne
Konjam thadam maarinen
Anbe Anbe
Nee vandha pinbae
Kaadhal unarndhen
